name: Hard Balls
description:
'The Hard Balls' game was inspired by Ballance Game from 2004.

Expect the following:

  • 3-5 minute playtime per level.
  • A strategic Puzzle
  • Many Obstacles and posible routes
  • 4 cool looking Evolve Types
  • Standard WASD movement with 3 Cameras Views
  • Possibility to Speed Run it

If you enjoyed this game, be sure to follow my social media and Youtube!

Let me know if you want me to add more levels! ( i will upload the making of them on my socials so you can see and learn how they are made!)

Enjoy my first ever game!
